TopicTitle: Kerbal Killer Atherius, present and accounted for.

Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, I've been playing KSP for probably just over a month after seeing some YouTube videos on it. I've always been interested in aerospace engineering, and finding a sim game for space physics that isn't boring or confusing

and more, erm... lighthearted than other technical space sims I've tried certainly sucked me into the game. I played the demos, watched plenty of videos on it, and then finally payed a modest $20 for it. I've been enjoying the thing greatly.

I have a question: I need a plugin or mod that can tell me stats on a rocket such as the weight of each stage, its ÃŽâ€v for vaccum and surface, its TWR, etc. I've seen MechJeb, which has all those things, but don't exactly... well, you know,

autopilot and stuff. All I want is the info. Any good mods for that?

Anyway, I am certainly enjoying the game and wish you all good launches and lower death tolls!

Welcome to the forums!

If you're looking for a decent MechJeb substitute that doesn't have the ever-so-tempting autopilot, I'd highly recommend Kerbal Engineer Redux. Having dabbled with both, I think that KER is much better as a build assistant than MechJeb is, as well.
Thank you much, I'll check that out!
